actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a tax credit for the purchase of home garden tools.
short_title: Home and Family Vegetable Garden Tax Credit Act

summary.text: Home and Family Vegetable Garden Tax Credit Act - Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, a tax credit to individuals for the purchase of home garden tools, equal to 7 percent of the expense of such tools, but not to exceed $100.

titles.title: Home and Family Vegetable Garden Tax Credit Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a tax credit for the purchase of home garden tools.
